definition: an imitation or repetition, to say again or imitate
details:
noun
- an imitation or repetition
= example: an imitation or repetition
- a close parallel of a feeling, idea, style, and so on
= example: a close parallel of a feeling, idea, style, and so on
- the repetition of a sound resulting from reflection of the sound waves
= example: the repetition of a sound resulting from reflection of the sound waves
= synonyms: replication
- a reflected television or radio or radar beam
- a reply that repeats what has just been said
verb
- to say again or imitate
= example: to say again or imitate
= synonyms: repeat
- ring or echo with sound
= synonyms: ring, reverberate, resound
- call to mind
= example: call to mind
= synonyms: recall, evoke, paint a picture, suggest
